name: DarkDIRE for Raspberry Pi: The Advanced Set
name_original: DarkDIRE for Raspberry Pi: The Advanced Set
description:
Inspired by old-school rogue-like and RPGs, DarkDIRE uses simple graphics/animation to build a living world. Explore endless procedurally generated kingdoms and dungeons. Gain loot by raiding enemy kingdoms. Sell it to become rich and powerful. Maybe even powerful enough to rule your own kingdom.

This Advanced Set is the full version of the game.  Requires Raspberry Pi 4. To start the game, the file "DarkDIREClient32" may need to be flagged as executable with the command "chmod +x DarkDIREClient32".
